A carefully constructed marker denoting a point of interest.

Welcome to Anphillia!
This server is a Role-Play server, and we mean it. We have a dream. We want this server to be one of the best servers available in the Role-Play section. To reach this goal, we tried to create an environment that both requires and helps roleplaying, and to get a player base that roleplays as much as possible.
On this server, you are required to stay in character as much as possible. Please take a look in the rulebook for details.
If you do not want to play on a roleplay server, there are Anphillia servers running in PW Story and in the Arena sections on gamespy that do not require roleplaying. Please make use of these - it is why we went to the trouble of setting them up, and releasing Anphillia to the public. To each their own, we say.
Characters who do not play in character ruin it for the ones who do, and for our DMs who put in many hours creating quests and a dynamic gaming environment for your pleasure. They too like interaction and roleplaying, and are dismayed and even angered when their time is wasted on those that do not roleplay.
For those who do roleplay, please enjoy your stay and have a great time :)
Don't forget to take a look at the Rulebook!
Visit our forums at http://www.anphillia.com/phpBB2 !
